attributes.additional_details: The UK is allowing immigration to soar, there is not enough jobs, or funding in government to support the mass influx of migrants there has been over the past 2 decades, a system needs to be developed to allow a limited number into the country each year that the economy can afford, and for every such migrant to meet criteria, such as being an english speaker, with a tough stance on religion, this country is a multi cultural nation and as such all should be treated EQUALLY, the right remains for all to practice in the way the choose fit, any such instance of mocking anthers faith or trying to insite power through faith should me met with immediate deportation.  The UK has to adopt regulations protocols and laws of immigration such as countries as Australia has been implementing.
